mapper.select: select * from fslist where stockCode like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') or korName like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') or korAbbrvName like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') or engName like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') or mrkCls like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') or scrCls like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') or stockType like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%')
